name: cat
description: A full-stack application that connects to TikTok Live streams and displays real-time visual effects based on live engagement events like likes, comments, gifts, follows, and shares.

scripts.dev: lsof -ti:8081 | xargs kill -9 || true && concurrently --names "SERVER,CLIENT" --prefix-colors "blue,green" "npm run server" "npm run client"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
